events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back on a wrong item delivery.
Assigning this refund case to agent Emma to handle the customer's refund request efficiently.
Hello! I’m Emma from customer support. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to process your refund quickly?
Sure, I have attached the photos of the item I got and here is my order number: 789654123. Please process the refund.
Thank you for the photos and order number. We have approved your refund, which will be processed to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for handling this quickly. I appreciate the refund approval and will await the payment in my account.
The refund case is now marked as resolved. Please contact us if you do not receive the refund within the specified time frame.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your refund. Let us know if there is anything else we can do to assist.
We are closing this case now as your refund has been completed successfully. Thank you for your patience.
